intro: Agrostis pseudointermedia, commonly known as slender meadowgrass, is a perennial grass species native to temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere. It typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in meadows, pastures, and along stream banks. The plant has slender,丛生的 leaves and produces small, spike-like inflorescences that bear numerous tiny flowers. It is valued for its ability to stabilize soil and is sometimes used in ecological restoration projects. The species is also a forage plant for livestock due to its high nutritional value.
